omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select distinct 
			NHS_Number,
			Weight_At_Start_Of_Cycle,
			Start_Date_Of_Cycle
		from omop_staging.sact_staging

omopColumns.query:
select distinct 
			NHS_Number,
			Weight_At_Start_Of_Cycle,
			Start_Date_Of_Cycle
		from omop_staging.sact_staging

			Weight_At_Start_Of_Cycle,
			Start_Date_Of_Cycle
		from omop_staging.sact_staging

omopColumns.name: measurement_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32828`. EHR episode record

omopColumns.name: value_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select distinct 
			NHS_Number,
			Weight_At_Start_Of_Cycle,
			Start_Date_Of_Cycle
		from omop_staging.sact_staging

omopColumns.name: measurement_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `4099154`. Body Weight
